Submodules

CausalLearning.CausalLearner module

class CausalLearner[source]

Bases: object

This class represents an Causal Learner. It contains the Configurations and Dataset objects.

class Configurations(dataset_input=None, configurations=None, n_jobs=0, CDHPO=None)[source]

Bases: object

learn_model()[source]

Run the OCT algorithm using the Configurations and Dataset objects.

Returns: results (Any): The results from running the OCT algorithm.

print_results(opt_conf=None)[source]
set_dataset(dataset)[source]

Set the Dataset object for the experiment.

Parameters: dataset (Dataset): The Dataset object to set.

Raises: TypeError: If dataset is not of type Dataset.

set_configurations(configurations)[source]

Set the Configurations object for the experiment.

Parameters: configurations (Configurations): The Configurations object to set.

Raises: TypeError: If configurations is not of type Configurations.

save_progress(path=None)[source]

Save the progress of the experiment to a file.

Parameters: path (str): The file path to save the progress to.

load_progress(path=None)[source]

Load the progress of the experiment from a file.

Parameters: path (str): The file path to load the progress from.

add_configurations_from_file(filename)[source]

Add additional Configurations to the experiment.

Parameters: filename (str): The filename of a json file.

update_learnt_model()[source]

Run the CDHPO algorithm already set with the new Configurations.

get_best_model_between_algorithms(algorithms)[source]
get_best_model_between_family(admit_latent_variables=None, assume_faithfulness=None, is_output_mec=None, accepts_missing_values=None)[source]
